dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, big news this week from the world of Elon Musk, specifically SpaceX. Seems like they, uh, surprisingly *failed* to complete an $850 million fundraising round?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, big news this week from the world of Elon Musk, specifically S P A C E X. Seems like they, uh, surprisingly failed to complete an eight hundred fifty million dollars fundraising round?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Billionaire Elon Musks rocket company SpaceX reportedly completed an $850 million fundraising round last week, as it looks to raise capital for its ambitious Starlink and Starship projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no kidding, right? And they're apparently scaling back some pretty ambitious projects, like Starlink and Starship. I mean, they're even planning to sell off some stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no kidding, right? And they're apparently scaling back some pretty ambitious projects, like Starlink and Starship. I mean, they're even planning to sell off some stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The latest fundraising round comes in the midst of two capital-intensive projects, Starship and Starlink.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is wild, 'cause then they *denied* it to Forbes. So, what's the truth here? CNBC was saying, like, a $74 billion valuation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is wild, cause then they denied it to Forbes. So, what's the truth here? C N B C was saying, like, a seventy four billion dollars valuation?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: SpaceX did not immediately respond to Forbes request for comment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! But then, the share price... this is peak Elon, right? They reportedly raised funds at $419.99 a share. Just a cent below that infamous $420.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! But then, the share price... this is peak Elon, right? They reportedly raised funds at four hundred nineteen dollars and ninety nine cents a share. Just a cent below that infamous four hundred twenty dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company raised new funds at $419.99 per share, per CNBC. That price is just a cent below $420 per share, potentially a reference to Elon Musks notorious Twitter post in 2018

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, of course! The meme lives on! So, like, how does this all impact Musk himself?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, of course! The meme lives on! So, like, how does this all impact Musk himself?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Forbes thinks his ownership actually increased. His stake could be worth, uh, $32 billion now, up from $20 billion. That's a huge jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Forbes thinks his ownership actually increased. His stake could be worth, uh, thirty two billion dollars now, up from twenty billion dollars. That's a huge jump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is not immediately clear if Musks ownership was diluted by the new round. If he managed to hold onto all 48%, his stake would now be worth about $32 billionup from roughly $20 billion previously, according to Forbes estimates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, I mean, that's adding, like, $12 billion to his net worth. Could push him past Bezos again for richest person on the planet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, I mean, that's adding, like, twelve billion dollars to his net worth. Could push him past Bezos again for richest person on the planet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That would boost Musks net worth by $12 billionbut thats still not enough for him to pass Bezos and retake the spot of the richest person on the planet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Potentially, yeah. His fortune's, like, $173 billion as of last week. Mostly Tesla stock, of course.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Potentially, yeah. His fortune's, like, one hundred seventy three billion dollars as of last week. Mostly Tesla stock, of course.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He is worth $173.4 billion as of market close on Tuesday, February 16, according to Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And these projects they're scaling back – Starship and Starlink – these are, like, their two big, capital-intensive babies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And these projects they're scaling back - Starship and Starlink - these are, like, their two big, capital-intensive babies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The latest fundraising round comes in the midst of two capital-intensive projects, Starship and Starlink.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Starship's meant to replace their existing rockets, you know, lower cost space travel. And Starlink's the satellite broadband, but, uh, early tests have shown it's pretty slow.

dialogue_turns.text: Plus, there was this other thing, a secondary transaction where insiders and investors couldn't sell an additional $750 million worth of their shares.
